mng: to comprehend, to apprehend, to become aware

exm.mng: to comprehend, to apprehend, to become aware
to come to understand, to realize, consciousness, awareness, Buddhist enlightenment (Sanskrit: cittotpāda)
perception, wits, power of understanding, comprehension
to suddenly realize, to suddenly see the light
to understand, to comprehend
a flash of realization, the truth in a flash, a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)
to experience, to realize, to comprehend
to come to realize, to appreciate (feelings)
Dawu county in Xiaogan 孝感[Xiao4 gan3], Hubei
to come to oneself, to come to realize, to come to see the truth, to wake up to reality
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers from the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 You2 Ji4]
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4], Son Goku, the main character in Dragon Ball 七龍珠|七龙珠[Qi1 long2 zhu1]
to comprehend (the nature of things etc), to achieve enlightenment
to repent
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
to achieve supreme enlightenment or nirvana (Buddhism)
fully aware, to recognize fully
to wake up to reality, to come to oneself, to realize, to see the truth
Dawu county in Xiaogan 孝感[Xiao4 gan3], Hubei
Sha Wujing, character from the Journey to the West
